did.head: Descriptive Summary
did.unittitle: Juvenile Index Card Files of the Virginia Dept. of Juvenile Justice,

odd.p: These records are part of the Dept. of Juvenile Justice record group (RG# 189)

accessrestrict.p: Privacy protected and other protected information is considered confidential and restricted from public access for 75 years (Code of Virginia 42.1-78). Types of information and records restricted may include but are not limited to personal information - social security numbers (2.2-3801). It is necessary for an archivist to review any unprocessed, modern record collections (those collections less than 75 years old) that may contain privacy protected or confidential information before the records can be used by patrons for research purposes or before any copies can be made. If you are planning to use these records, please contact Archives Reference Services for more details before planning your research trip.

scopecontent.p: Juvenile index card files, 1895-1987, of the Virginia Dept. of Juvenvile Justice. Index cards contain information about each offender, which may include their name, date of birth, race, sex, date of imprisonment, names of parents, locations to which they were sent, and offense committed.
